类 ChessPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChessPiece
  • 直接已知子类:
    BishopPiece, CannonPiece, ElephantPiece, GuardPiece, HorsePiece, KingPiece, KnightPiece, PawnPiece, QueenPiece, RookPiece, SoldierPiece, XiangqiKingPiece

    public abstract class ChessPiece
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that encodes specific rules for a version of pieces.
    作者:
    Bruce Dong

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明

      Stores a chess piece

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ChessPiece

        public ChessPiece(ChessGame.Side side,
                  int row,
                  int col,
                  java.lang.String label,
                  ChessBoard board)
        Stores a chess piece
        参数:
        side - the side of the piece
        row - the number of rows at the chessboard
        col - the number of columns at the chessboard
        label - the liable of the piece
        board - the board that its belong to

    • 方法详细资料

                        int col)
        set its column and row.
        参数:

        row - the label of the piece

      • isLegalMove

        public abstract boolean isLegalMove(int toRow,
                                    int toColumn)
        Determines if it is legal to move the piece to its given location.
        参数:
        toRow - the row of the square the piece want to go
        toColumn - the column of the square the piece want to go
        返回:
        true if the piece is allowed to move there

        public boolean isLegalNonCaptureMove(int toRow,
                                     int toColumn)
        Determines if it is legal to move the piece to its given location without capture.
        参数:

        toColumn - the column of the square the piece want to go
        返回:
        true if the piece is allowed to move there without capture

      • isLegalCaptureMove

        public boolean isLegalCaptureMove(int toRow,
                                  int toColumn)
        Determines if it is legal to move the piece to its given location with capture.
        参数:
        toRow - the row of the square the piece want to go
        toColumn - the column of the square the piece want to go
        返回:
        true if the piece is allowed to move there with capture

                     int toRow,

        Necessary operation after the piece can move to there
        参数:
        piece - the piece that is moved
        toRow - the row of the square the piece want to go
        toColumn - the column of the square the piece want to go

      • isLegalMoveStraight

        public boolean isLegalMoveStraight(int rowT,
                                   int colT)
        Determines if it is legal to move the piece to its given location straightly.
        参数:
        rowT - the row of the square the piece want to go
        colT - the column of the square the piece want to go
        返回:
        true if the piece is allowed to move there straightly

                                   int colT)

        参数:

        colT - the column of the square the piece want to go
        返回:

                             int toColumn)

        toColumn - the given column of the square
        返回:
        true if the space given piece is empty

                             int toColumn)

        toColumn - the given column of the square
        返回:

      • pieceBetweenEmpty

        public boolean pieceBetweenEmpty(int rowK,
                                 int colK,
                                 int colR)
        Determines if the given space between the will-castle-move king and rook is threaded/ empty.
        参数:
        rowK - the given row of the king
        colK - the given column of the king
        colR - the given column of the rook
        返回:
        true if the piece given space between the will-castle-move king and rook is threaded/ empty

      • moved

        public boolean moved()
        Determines if the piece is moved.
        返回:
        true if the piece is moved

      • isLegalNotMove

        public boolean isLegalNotMove(int toRow,
                              int toColumn)
        Determines if the piece is moving to its original space.
        参数:
        toRow - the given row of the intended move place
        toColumn - the given column of the intended move place
        返回:
        true if the piece is moving to its original space

      • isKingFace

        public boolean isKingFace(int toRow,
                          int toColumn,
                          int kingTime)
        Determines if the given space a king that can face the other king
        参数:
        toRow - the given row of the square
        toColumn - the given column of the square
        kingTime - if there is a king, it should be 1, other wise 0
        返回:
        true if the given space a king that can face the other king

      • amAKing

        public boolean amAKing()
        Determines if piece is a king
        返回:
        true if it is a king
